abilities.name: Keen Smell.
abilities.description: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

abilities.name: Kicking Retreat.
abilities.description: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

abilities.name: Mimicry.
abilities.description: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

abilities.name: Rampage.
abilities.description: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.
